Municipal Practices

Complete solutions for all Municipal practices

Home > Services > Municipal Practices

Administrative practice agencies in Milan, including Acentro Services, offer multiple services related to municipal practices. Acentro Services provides support for managing formalities and compliance with public administration entities.

Here is a detailed list of services offered for Municipal practices:

Authorizations and Certificates

Authorizations and Communications

Complete assistance for managing authorizations and communications with municipal offices.

SCIA Model Preparation and Submission

Support in preparing and submitting the Certified Report of Business Commencement.

Various Certificates

Request and collection of registry certificates, extracts, and other municipal documentation.

Protocol Office Documentation Submission

Assistance in submitting documents to the Municipal Protocol Office.

A.I.R.E. Office

Support for practices related to the Registry of Italians Residing Abroad.

Special Authorizations

Precious Items and Used Goods Register Authentication

Assistance for authenticating mandatory registers for precious items and used goods dealers.

Public Space and Area Occupation Authorization

Support in obtaining authorizations for public space and area occupation.

Sign and Parking Deterrent Authorizations

Assistance with practices related to commercial sign installation and parking deterrents.

Contracts and Licenses

Lease Contracts

Complete assistance for managing lease contracts and related requirements.

Lease Contract Preparation and Submission

Support in preparing and registering lease contracts with competent offices.

License or Authorization Request Management

Assistance in managing SCIA, DIA, and other authorizations necessary for business startup.

SUAP Services

Acentro Services provides assistance for SUAP (Single Point of Contact for Production Activities) practices, which is the office where business startup practices are managed. We handle careful verifications, prepare correct practices to avoid suspensions or rejections, and respect deadlines to avoid penalties.

Related Digital Services

Acentro Services also offers digital services such as Digital Signature and Certified Email (PEC), which are useful tools for simplifying operational processes related to communication with the Municipality.

DIGIPRAM: The Management Software for Administrative Practices

Additionally, Acentro Services provides DIGIPRAM, a management software designed for administrative practice agencies, which facilitates practice management and offers features such as document management.

Need assistance with your Municipal practices?

Contact us for a personalized consultation and discover how we can help you simplify the management of your practices with the Municipality.

Request Information

Fast and efficient solutions for businesses and professionals since 1986.
